comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ben_Dyer In 1914 he had his debut with the New York Giants. I am not sure why the previous attribution placed it in 1917 when he was with Detroit, was it based on the uniform?

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Richard, it's the gang from the Society for American Baseball Research, sowing confusion again.

At this point, we are in January, 1914 in the LOC postings of the Bain News Agency's photostream. That photo was not taken in January, so probably dates from the summer of 1913, at the latest.
